author: James Van Straten
title: Bitcoin Price Not Being Suppressed, Selling by Long-Term Holders, Checkmate Says
description: Long-term holders selling as market consolidates above $100,000.
content:
Bitcoin 
 has been consolidating above $100,000 since the start of May. The only time the price drop below $100,000 was on 22 June, which was a weekend when tensions escalated between Iran and the U… [+1377 chars]
